creator: jdpierce75@hotmail.com
text:
The file org/apache/xalan/res/XSLTInfo.properties in xalan.jar sets the property
org.xml.sax.driver to org.apache.crimson.parser.XMLReaderImpl instead of
org.apache.xerces.parsers.SAXParser, which is problematic since
org.apache.crimson.parser.XMLReaderImpl is not included in any of the jars
distributed with JSTL.  (The problem manifests itself when invoking
xml/Filter.jsp, xml/Transform.jsp, and xml/TransformWithInclusion.jsp in the
example web app.)  Changing the setting back to
org.apache.xerces.parsers.SAXParser corrects the problem.

Yes - thanks for the report; the issue you note has been confirmed.  The 
problem can't be fixed in the running CVS archive; it affects distributions 
only.  We've noted the problem and will address it in the next distribution of 
the Standard Taglib (1.0.3).

Thanks again,

Shawn
